U

update(World) - Method in class com.threecubed.auber.entities.GameEntity
The "brain" of the entity, run any code that should be run at each render cycle that isn't related to rendering the entity.
update(World) - Method in class com.threecubed.auber.entities.Infiltrator
 
update(World) - Method in class com.threecubed.auber.entities.Npc
Control the state the NPC is in and fire any necessary events when need be.
update(World) - Method in class com.threecubed.auber.entities.Player
Handle player controls such as movement, interaction and firing the teleporing gun.
update(World) - Method in class com.threecubed.auber.entities.Projectile
Step the projectile in its target direction, execute the collision handler if it hits the Player, destroy if it hits anything else.
updateEntities() - Method in class com.threecubed.auber.World
Apply any queued entity removals/additions to the world.
updatePath(float, float, World) - Method in class com.threecubed.auber.entities.Npc
Update the Npc.currentPath to a given set of x and y coordinates.
updateSystemState(float, float, World.SystemStates) - Method in class com.threecubed.auber.World
Update the sprite of a system to match a new state.
Utils - Class in com.threecubed.auber
A collection of utility functions that don't belong within a specific class.
Utils() - Constructor for class com.threecubed.auber.Utils
